title: Steam Store Scraper Configuration
description: Configure your Steam Store scraping job. Scrapes game pages directly for fast, reliable data collection.

startUrl.title: Custom Steam URL (Optional)
startUrl.description: Start with a specific Steam Store URL. If provided, overrides keyword and sort settings.

keyword.title: Search Games By Name/Keyword
keyword.description: Search for specific games, genres, or keywords (e.g., 'action', 'RPG', 'free to play'). Leave empty to browse all.

sortBy.title: Sort Results
sortBy.description: How to sort the search results.

maxResults.title: Max Games to Scrape
maxResults.description: Maximum number of games to collect (1-5000).

maxPages.title: Max Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum pages to crawl (~25 games per page). Higher = more results but slower.

maxConcurrency.title: Concurrency (Speed)
maxConcurrency.description: How many games to scrape in parallel (1-50). Higher = faster but may trigger rate limits.

onlyOnSale.title: Only Games on Sale
onlyOnSale.description: If enabled, scrape only discounted games.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Settings
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for better reliability and faster scraping.
